extends java.lang.Object
implements sagex.remote.SagexServlet.SageHandler

      static java.lang.String PARAM_BATCH
      Phoenix token to identify that the commands are a batch of commands identified by this json array structure * * "batch"
      static java.lang.String PARAM_COMMAND
      Phoenix Command either in the form of c=phoenix.umb.CreateView(viewnam) or c=phoenix.umb.CreateView&1=viewname * * "c"
      static java.lang.String PARAM_CONTEXT
      SageTV UI context in which to execute the command * * "context"

      Server Side reference name in which to store the resulting object * * "ref"

      • PARAM_REFERENCE_EXPIRY

        public static final java.lang.String PARAM_REFERENCE_EXPIRY
        The length of time in MS that the server reference should be stored before it is expired. By default references are never expired. * * "refexpiry"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAM_SERIALIZATION_DEPTH

        public static final java.lang.String PARAM_SERIALIZATION_DEPTH
        A Hint to be passed the serializers when serializing lists. Not all serializers will honor this hint but some will, such as the VFS serializer. A depth of 1 means to serialize only the current folder items. By default depth is 0 which means serialize all folders and sub folders. * "depth"
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
